file_content.text: I'm conducting diplomatic efforts from the spaceport, from now on. I, er, may have to leave unexpectedly.
You got the passcodes--wonderful! Ambassador Averdon will be very happy to meet you. He's on the Promenade.
The damage those criminals could do with our security passcodes is incalculable. We have to get them back.
Oh my skies--a Jedi! Please, help us. Innocent people are being slaughtered in the streets.
I recognize that insignia--Havoc Squad. Thank the stars you're here, soldier. We're under siege!
Listen to me--don't leave the spaceport if you want to live. People are dying right outside.
If you know what's good for you, don't set foot outside this spaceport. It's practically a war zone.
I'm Minister Plennid with the Republic's Diplomatic Corps. I was almost killed out there!
The Kintan Kings gang controls this part of Nar Shaddaa. They're violent and well-armed Niktos who hate the Republic.
The gang attacked me right out on the street, in full view of everyone. My bodyguards were dead before I knew what was happening.
Where can I find these killers?
These gangsters will pay.
They're still outside. But I have worse news.
How awful.
What's your point?
Surely there's something you people can do to help?
You're a Jedi. This is a Republic emergency.
But your superiors sent you to help, didn't they?
We're all--all of us--in terrible danger.
I'm trying to save your life. The situation here is about to get a great deal worse.
The murders aren't the worst of it. My bodyguards all carried Republic passcodes--and now the gangsters have them!
With those passcodes, the Kintan Kings can slip right through our security. We'll be defenseless.
Don't worry, I'll get those security passcodes back.
Good thing I'm here.
I hope you and your friends scare the scales off those degenerates.
I fear a Jedi is the only one who can resolve this crisis.
Those criminals are deadly. Don't underestimate their threat.
I shouldn't entrust those passcodes to just anyone, but this is an emergency and you're all I've got.
I can't ask you to risk your life... but I haven't much choice.
How much are those security passcodes worth to you?
Is there a reward for my help?
Is everyone on this miserable moon a mercenary?
Are you actually demanding money to save the Republic? I... I... fine!
What? Republic Special Forces, demanding credits like a common mercenary... what a galaxy!
I suppose trusting a mercenary I've never met before is better than the alternative....
I pegged you for a patriot, not a common mercenary.
If you recover the security passcodes from the Kintan Kings, I promise you'll be compensated--just not by me.
Alert security.
I urge you and your friends to reconsider.
But you're a Jedi! If you can't help us, who can?
They say Republic soldiers never back down from a fight. Is that just recruitment poster hyperbole?
I never meant to suggest you were capable of helping. I was only warning you of the danger.
I understand. It's not as though you're trained to face danger.
Whatever the Kintan Kings do with the passcodes, it's sure to hurt all of us. We desperately need them back.
I should take care of this problem before it interferes with my own business.
Then I'd better intervene.
I trust your friends are equally self-absorbed.
Enlightened self-interest wins the day again. Hooray.
Everyone, eh?
Glad to see my diplomatic training finally paying off.
I'm a good enough diplomat not to argue with your change of heart.
Wait, what? But you're not authorized to... oh, who am I to argue? We need all the help we can get.
Recovering our security passcodes from those filthy criminals will save countless innocent lives, including mine.
The Kintan Kings who shot my bodyguards are still outside the spaceport. They have the passcodes, I'm sure of it.
Maybe not. [Refuse quest]
Easy for you to say. I must alert the ambassador....
A pleasure to see you.
Those gangsters assault anyone they even suspect of being a Republic citizen. They'll kill us all!
Minister, what did these gangsters look like?
Not while I'm around.
All I remember was a blaster pointed at my face--but I know who was holding it.
Has the Republic done something to anger these gangsters?
Have we offended them?
Who can fathom what motivates criminal scum?
They can't be that tough if you managed to get away.
They must be lousy shots.
The only reason I'm still breathing is because of my bodyguards.
People have been trying to kill me for as long as I can remember.
That's nothing new.
Be serious. These criminals have murdered dozens of innocent people.
You're not making sense.
They won't get me.
All fine and good for you, but what about us diplomats?
I, er, shouldn't leave until security arrives. When you get the passcodes, deliver them to Ambassador Averdon on the Promenade.
Warn everyone to stay off the streets. I'll handle this.
Keep these people safe.
I look forward to meeting the ambassador.
Consider it done.
May the Force be with you, Master Jedi.
Is there somebody wearing power armor I can give the passcodes to, instead?
They'd be safer with military.
The Promenade is the most secure area on Nar Shaddaa. The passcodes will be safe with Ambassador Averdon.
Don't worry, I've done this sort of thing before.
You're in good hands.
Good. I'd hate to think I was entrusting this job to an insane person.
I read you.
Go cower someplace else.
Er... yes, of course.
